user-closed-popup.title: Sign in error
user-closed-popup.description: The connection to the login provider was closed. Please try again.

Auth.siwe-statement: Sign in to the Offline app with your wallet

error-signing-in-with-siwe.title: Error signing in with your wallet
error-signing-in-with-siwe.description: Something went wrong with the signature. Please try again or contact the support if its still failing.

siwe-declined.title: Connection with your wallet declined
siwe-declined.description: You declined the signature request to connect to the Offline app. Please try again.

List.no-cart: You don't have anything in your cart yet

Successful.title: Purchase Successful! ðŸŽ‰
Successful.description: Thank you for your purchase. Your passes should be available in a few minutes.

Cancelled.title: Purchase Cancelled
Cancelled.description: Your purchase has been successfully cancelled. We're sorry to see you go. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. Feel free to continue shopping if you change your mind.

UserPass.title: Pass
UserPass.no-pass: You don't have any pass yet
UserPass.minting-success-message: {numPass, plural, =1 {Your pass is being minted and will be added to your wallet shortly. You should receive it within a few minutes.}other {# passes are being minted and will be added to your wallet shortly. You should receive them within a few minutes.}}

UserPassEventCard.dialog-title: {numPassNotRevealed, plural, =1 {# pass not revealed} other {# passes not revealed}}
UserPassEventCard.dialog-description:
To reveal {numPassNotRevealed, plural, =0 {it} =1 {it} other {them}} would imply that the pass has been shown.

{numPassNotRevealed, plural, =0 {It} =1 {It} other {They}} will be marked as such in case {numPassNotRevealed, plural, =0 {it's} =1 {it's} other {they're}} re-sold on the secondary market, making {numPassNotRevealed, plural, =0 {it} =1 {it} other {them}} harder to sell.



Are you sure you want to reveal {numPassNotRevealed, plural, =0 {it} =1 {it} other {them}}?
UserPassEventCard.dialog-toast-success-description: {numPass, plural, =1 {The pass has been revealed and downloaded successfully} other {The # passes have been revealed and downloaded successfully}}
UserPassEventCard.dialog-toast-error-title: {numPass, plural, =1 {Error revealing and downloading the pass} other {Errors revealing and downloading the passes}}
UserPassEventCard.dialog-toast-error-description: {numPass, plural, =1 {There was an error revealing and downloading the pass. {errorMessage}} other {There were errors revealing and downloading the # passes. {errorMessage}}}
UserPassEventCard.download-passes-toast-success-title: {numPass, plural, =1 {Pass download successful} other {# Passes download successful}}
UserPassEventCard.download-passes-toast-success-comment: {numPass, plural, =1 {The pass has been downloaded successfully} other {The # passes have been downloaded successfully}}
UserPassEventCard.download-passes-toast-error-title: {numPass, plural, =1 {Error downloading the pass} other {Errors downloading the passes}}
UserPassEventCard.download-passes-toast-error-comment: {numPass, plural, =1 {There was an error downloading the pass.} other {There were errors downloading the # passes.}}

UserPassEventPassActions.helper-text: Choose an action for this pass

UserPassEventPassActions.action-reveal-toast-success-description: The pass has been revealed and downloaded successfully
UserPassEventPassActions.action-download-toast-error-description: Something went wrong while downloading the pass. Please try again.
UserPassEventPassActions.action-download-toast-success-descriptio: The pass has been downloaded successfully

IsPassRevealedAlert.buyer-revealed-description: The original owner has already revealed the pass. Make sure you trust the seller as you won't be the first to have access to this pass.
IsPassRevealedAlert.buyer-unrevealed-description: This access pass is still hidden. You can buy it without worrying about prior use.

To access exclusive experiences and perks, we need a few details from you.
